version_description:
• Support for pinch and zoom with camera in point to sky.
• Improved moon rendering (god ray) in the local view.
• Improved multithreaded rendering and faster loading.
• Other bug fixes and improvements (moon phases and text overlap in search page.)

• Now offered with permanent in app purchase or annual subscription. See the updated app description for details.
• Ability to force to english language in application settings.
• New app font
• Other bug fixes and improvements
Bugs fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB ! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Every update of our SkyORB app includes improvements for speed and reliability. This updates adds Ceres and Vesta dwarf planet and asteroid, updated size of saturnian moon, updated astronomy engine with 2018 leap seconds and other bug fixes and improvements,

Thanks for using SkyORB ! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Every update of our SkyORB app includes improvements for speed and reliability. This updates adds Ceres and Vesta dwarf planet and asteroid, updated size of saturnian moon, updated astronomy engine with 2018 leap seconds.

This update fixes the compatibility with iPad Air 1/2 when using low quality rendering mode, and allow point to sky without having the camera permission enabled.

Thanks for using SkyORB ! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Every update of our SkyORB app includes improvements for speed and reliability. This updates improves Ceres and Vesta dwarf planets position with higher accuracy, the planets are using position in equal distance or in realistic distance from the sun. Trojans asteroids belt are now displayed.

Thanks for using SkyORB ! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Every update of our SkyORB app includes improvements for speed and reliability. In this update:

• Better handling when the device is not connected to the network, removing unnecessary screens, showing offline icon, remember last known position.
• Fixed the location search, added more cities.
• Premium version only : Astronomy twilight notifications and civil notifications are both generated from your location.
• Other bug fixes and improvements
Thanks for using SkyORB ! This update is now supporting iOS 12 improved, notifications, adds support for the latest iPhone X/XS/XR, latest Apple Watch and other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB ! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Every update of our SkyORB app includes improvements for speed and reliability. This update adds a redesigned way for displaying star and planets labels, improved performance and bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB ! To make our app better for you, we bring updates to the App Store regularly. Every update of our SkyORB app includes improvements for speed and reliability: In the update:

- New ultra high definition 8192x8192 textures of Earth, Mars, Jupiter and Saturn with adaptive scalable texture compression.
- New Messier Catalog texture, with twice the size than the original version and updated from 2017 and 2018. Improved display in local view.
- Improves calendar calculation for perigee and apogee date.
- Sun rise and set time notifications now calculated for a week instead of 48 hours.
- Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB ! In this update, the deep objects catalog is now improved, the astronomy events calendar now offer the 'timeshift' ability to set the app to the date of the event,
moon eclipse event are now only notified if the event if visible based from your location, addressed the default user location now from your language country code and time zone in case you opt to disable location services, improved facebook login and other bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using SkyORB. In this update, weather information is working again with a new server, added jupiter events page, with jupiter and moons position seen from earth and list of events like occultation, shadow, transit and more. Addressing the scrolling back the previous astronomy events on iPhone 5.5' and lower size.

Thanks for using SkyORB - Astronomy for Everyone. In this update, you will get a new improved meteor shower engine, with up to 400 meteor showers, with exact time of peak of fall, display of the active apparent radiant of a meteor shower is the celestial point in the sky from which the paths of meteors appear to originate.

Also improved the space view and the notification of astronomy events page.

Please note that this version now requires at least iOS 9.3 to operate.

Thanks for using SkyORB - Astronomy for Everyone app. This update has an entirely redesigned sun clock and sun graph, including current day and whole year sun graph, with night, nautical twilight and civil twilight. Time of sun set and sun rise are now even more improved. Also includes other bug fixes and improvements.
Thanks for using SkyORB, in this update, you can switch the view of the sun graph in the ephemeris page, also added a link to privacy settings in the location page, other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB - Astronomy for Everyone app., in this update, iOS 13 supported, improved font rendering and improved selection of planet with a list on phone, instead of changing to a next planet. Other bug fixes and improvements.
This updates adresses a couple of small issues, and improves compatibility with latest iOS version.
In this update: Improved font rendering, fix for notifications, other bug fixes and improvements.

Major update: SkyORB is now using Metal for rendering instead of OpenGL ES, addressing 'black screen' on iOS 13, also Important fixes for Apple Watch notification not showing in some case, added 'Reset Factory Settings' in Application Settings to reset the whole application, other bug fixes and improvements.
In this update, added new complication for Apple Watch, redesigned Today widget, reduced size of the application, other bug fixes and improvements.
Fix the black screen at startup on some devices running iOS 13.0

In this update: Major update of the watch app optimized for Watch Series 5: Realtime sky chart, redesigned complication with equation of time now graphical. The main app has bug fixes with MPC settings not saved properly, fixed the sun clock and other improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. In this update, added new stereographic view in the local sky view,  with zoom, rotate and compass orientation. Improved search function, improved red screen mode and other bug fixes and improvement.

Thanks for using SkyORB. In this update, added new stereographic view in the local sky view, with zoom, rotate and compass orientation. Improved search function, improved red screen mode and other bug fixes and improvement.

To enable the stereographic view, use the 6 square icons in the local view (3rd row).
The 2019.12.2 updates address stability issues with MPC update.

Thanks for using SkyORB. In this update, added new stereographic view in the local sky view, with zoom, rotate and compass orientation. Improved search function, improved red screen mode and other bug fixes and improvement.

To enable the stereographic view, use the 6 square icons in the local view (3rd row).
The 2019.12.2 update addresses stability issues with MPC update.
The 2019.12.3 update improves astronomy news download times.

Thanks for using SkyORB Astronomy App!

In this version:

- Added option to disable facebook notifications.
- Improved planet rendering around the poles.
- Corrected planet period display.
- Improved constellation names rendering.
- Improved star pick and major stars in constellations.
- Updating the app now show a release notes.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. New app icon and updated menus.
. Added asterisms (pattern or group of stars that can be seen in the night sky).
. Timeshift now autoplay and display the advance time per secs.
. Constellations can be displayed in space view, also in real 3D coordinates.
. Stars labels added in space view in 3D
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

In this update
- Fixed time shift in local and space thanks to user reports.
- New app preview.
- Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. The moon page can be toggled to fullscreen with larger display of the moon.
. Added moon craters and features
. Added moon time shift with phases and librations.
. Location position now visible in space view.
. Added notification if heading is incorrect due to magnetic interferences.
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. New 3D star map is now more interactive than ever!
. Searching for a star will now show directly to the space view (3D star map) and in local view.
. New build star database, with 30% more stars !
. Accurate colors of the stars from BV color index instead of the spectrum class.
. Improved transition when zooming from solar system to 3D star map.
. Improved zoom in local view.
. Searching for an exoplanet now shows the star which it is orbiting.
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

. The minor planet database is now updated with many of new features ! New redesigned page, better synchronisation, shows the last date of synchronisation, a 2D sun chart of the comets/satellite path with time shift, shows date of last observation and orbital period.
. The local view and space view now display only the selected comet or satellite. the path is also calculated.
. Improved gesture management in the 3D local view and space view.
. Sun clock world map can be zoomed in and out, improved rendering of the planet culmination chart.
. New 3D model of promoteus, phobos, deimos and vesta.
. Improved translation for some language
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. Jovian events now includes full screen, System II longitude, magnitude and time-shift.
. When selected, comets and meteors now display rise and set times and magnitudes. Positions for the next 7 days are plotted in the local view.
. Improved phase calculation. Elongation are now displayed.
. When activate the camera for Augmented Reality, the compass heading accuracy is now displayed.
. The information of planet, star are now improved and widgets have been redesigned with a 'close' button.
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. Jovian events now includes full screen, System II longitude, magnitude and time-shift.
. When selected, comets and meteors now display rise and set times and magnitudes. Positions for the next 7 days are plotted in the local view.
. Improved phase calculation. Elongation are now displayed.
. When activate the camera for Augmented Reality, the compass heading accuracy is now displayed.
. The information of planet, star are now improved and widgets have been redesigned with a 'close' button.
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

This patch address compass position overlapping, and stability issues.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. Changed the button to active AR
. Restore compatibility with iOS 10 and older devices.
. Timeshift can be set to zero multiplier.
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. When showing the 3D Star Map, a grid in light-years is now displayed.
. When showing the moon phase in full screen, the orbit of the moon is now displayed.
. Resolved the automatic detection for OpenGL only on older devices (iPad 4).
. Other bug fixes and improvements;

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. Redesigned the gallery view mode in the space 3D view.
. Ability to sort the planet by size, swipe gesture to change planet.
. Improved label display.
. Updated for iOS 14
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. Redesigned deep objects database, more complete. More information when selecting a deep object.
. The light travel time from earth is now calculated when navigating in the space view.
. Added Starlink MPC database.
. Support for macOS Big Sur and Apple Silicon.
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. Redesigned deep objects database, more complete. More information when selecting a deep object.
. The light travel time from earth is now calculated when navigating in the space view.
. Added Starlink MPC database (Premium only).
. Other bug fixes and improvements.
. Update 2: Addressed checkboxes in Starlink Database.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

. Redesigned deep objects database, more complete. More information when selecting a deep object.
. The light travel time from earth is now calculated when navigating in the space view.
. Added Starlink MPC database (Premium only).
. Other bug fixes and improvements.
. Update 2: Addressed checkboxes in Starlink Database.
. Update 3: Fixed UI on iPhone 12 Pro, Fixed user defined longitude & latitude configuration.

. Day and night color can be toggled directly from a new button in the local view.
. ARKit errors are now displayed for diagnostic.
. Added Ad Tracking Permission for iOS 14.
. Ability to disable the camera preview in AR from display settings.
. Improved star rendering.
. Improved pick-up cursor.
. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:
- Added new buttons for displaying the artificial satellites.
- Satellites now appears in stereographic view and in the world map view.
- Satellites now display the ground position coordinates.
- Sidreal time is now updated in realtime in the settings page.
- Added a button to display distance units in nautical miles instead of kilometres,
- Improved slider in stereographic view.

. Other bug fixes and improvements.

Updated 2 : Added ability to disable some MPC database entries. Fixed orbit list not synchronized properly.

- Satellites now appears in 3D planetarium.
- Improved loading time of large satellites database.
- Updated Starlink icons.

Thanks for using SkyORB. Here the changes in this version:

- Redesigned timeshift interface using a dial. Orbits are now displayed when using it.
- Improved search engine : stars can be search by Hyparcos, Gliese or proper name.
- Added Methuselah star.
- Fixed date and time cut-off on iPhone 12 mini
- Redesigned display of complexion equation of time on Apple Watch.
- Other bug fixes and improvements.
